mapper.insert: insert into jumei.jm_bt_images ( channel_id, image_key, image_type, image_type_extend, image_index, origin_url, jm_url, syn_flg, created, creater, modified, modifier) values ( #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imageTypeExtend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{originUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jmUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{synFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE syn_flg = if(origin_url = #{originUrl}, syn_flg, 0), modified = if(origin_url = #{originUrl}, modified, now()), modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, origin_url = if(origin_url = #{originUrl}, origin_url, #{originUrl})
mapper.select: select syn_flg as synFlg, count(*) as recCount from jumei.jm_bt_images where channel_id = #{channelId} and image_key = #{imageKey} group by syn_flg
mapper.update: update jumei.jm_bt_product_import product, (SELECT img.channel_id, img.image_key from jumei.jm_bt_images img where img.channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and img.syn_flg = 0 and img.creater != img.modified GROUP BY img.channel_id, img.image_key) imgm set product.syn_flg = if(product.syn_flg = '2', '1', product.syn_flg), product.modified = now(), product.modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where product.channel_id = imgm.channel_id and product.product_code = imgm.image_key and product.deal_id = #{dealId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
